## Source: ossf-package-analysis (ea4e46b7975921ec0e2cc254cb6c6928c5e97abff2009eb36708a1e24dce9b93)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@platform-clientextensions/rum-web' @ 999.999.1005 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
